players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed on Night 1, so one of you three is the mafioso. We need to discuss who seems most suspicious and share any information we have."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana is confirmed innocent."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. Diana is innocent."

Diana: "Both Charlie and Bob are claiming to be the detective and accusing each other. Only one can be telling the truth. We need to vote out one of them today - if we're wrong, the real detective can investigate the other tonight."
You: "Charlie is lying. I investigated him and he's mafioso. Diana, trust me - vote Charlie out."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob - he is mafioso. Diana, vote Bob with me to win."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed on Night 1, so one of you three is the mafioso. We need to discuss who seems most suspicious and share any information we have."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana is confirmed innocent."
Bob: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. Diana is innocent."

Diana: "Both Charlie and Bob are claiming to be the detective and accusing each other. Only one can be telling the truth. We need to vote out one of them today - if we're wrong, the real detective can investigate the other tonight."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I investigated him and he's mafioso. Diana, trust me - vote Charlie out."
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob - he is mafioso. Diana, vote Bob with me to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
